title:
After looking at aerial views of the Wilmington it appears that Market Street could have been continued across the Cape Fear River via a bridge to the west bank.  (Carolina Road on the west side aligns perfectly with the Market Street.)  Was there a ferry in the past that traveled this route? 



Thanks,





Will
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=6256
